projects.title: FloraFauna GO
projects.description: The projet was divide into 2 side project, an application for the client side, and an API to manage the server side like the identification, link to a database.

projects.title: Connect4
projects.description: It's an educative project to learn how to use Swift in Command Line. It an implementation of the classic Connect4 game, TicTacToe and PopOut. Using Event, callback, listener...

projects.title: Application to manage UCA's items
projects.description: Implement an app mobile to manage the items of UCA, you can use use item to borrow, return, reserve, and see the history of your items. You can manage your profile, and it's connected to the UCA API.

projects.title: Elpy
projects.description: Elpy is a tool box application, that allow you to Convert currency, use notes, to make a png on a map and wrote information, chrono, audio converter.

projects.title: Silent Museum
projects.description: An Unreal Engine 5 project, it's an horror game. The goal is simple you have to solved task to escape from a Museum but a monster is following you by the sound that you make when you walk, throw stone to fake your position

projects.title: Tobby's Adventure
projects.description: It's a python game inspired by the first Zelda, you have to explore the world, find items, and defeat enemies. It's a 2D game with pixel art style. We won a Prize for this project.
